exceptions.exn: In environment y : Rbar x : R_UniformSpace Unable to unify "(fun u : R => Rbar_lt u ?M2443) x" with "(fun u : R => Rbar_lt y u) x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall y : Rbar, open (fun u : R => Rbar_lt y u)

Premises:
Inductive Rbar : Set := Finite : R -> Rbar | p_infty : Rbar | m_infty : Rbar For Finite: Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rbar_lt = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match y with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
*** [ R : Set ]
open = fun (T : UniformSpace) (D : T -> Prop) => forall x : T, D x -> locally x D : forall T : UniformSpace, (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
open_Rbar_lt : forall y : Rbar, open (fun u : R => Rbar_lt u y)
open_gt : forall y : R, open (fun u : R => y < u)
closed_ge : forall y : R, closed (fun u : R => y <= u)
open_neq : forall y : R, open (fun u : R => u <> y)
open_lt : forall y : R, open (fun u : R => u < y)
closed_le : forall y : R, closed (fun u : R => u <= y)
closed_eq : forall y : R, closed (fun u : R => u = y)
Rbar_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_abs_lt_between : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt (Rbar_abs x) y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_opp y) x /\ Rbar_lt x y
Rbar_opp_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt (Rbar_opp x) (Rbar_opp y) < -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y
Rbar_lt_not_eq : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> x <> y
Rbar_le_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_lt_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z
at_right = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => x < u) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
Rbar_not_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_le_not_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le y x -> ~ Rbar_lt x y
Rbar_not_le_lt : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_lt_not_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt y x -> ~ Rbar_le x y
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
Rbar_lt_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {~ Rbar_lt x y}
locally_interval : forall (P : R -> Prop) (x : R) (a b : Rbar), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> (forall y : R, Rbar_lt a y -> Rbar_lt y b -> P y) -> locally x P
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
Rbar_mult_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_mult_pos x z) (Rbar_mult_pos y z)
Rbar_div_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_div_pos x z) (Rbar_div_pos y z)
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
open_and : forall D E : ?T -> Prop, open D -> open E -> open (fun x : ?T => D x /\ E x) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
open_or : forall D E : ?T -> Prop, open D -> open E -> open (fun x : ?T => D x \/ E x) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
